Access Control Systems

Professional card readers, mobile access, and integrated security solutions for hotels, colleges, and commercial buildings

Request Quote See Projects

Complete Access Control Solutions

From standalone readers to enterprise-wide systems

Card Reader Systems

Proximity cards, smart cards, and dual-technology readers from leading manufacturers. Secure, reliable access control for any application.

Mobile Credentials

Smartphone-based access using NFC and Bluetooth technology. Convenient, secure, and perfect for hospitality and commercial applications.

Integrated Solutions

Property management integration, visitor management, and building automation connectivity for comprehensive security management.

Access Technologies

Choose the right technology for your security needs

Proximity & Smart Cards

  • ✓ 125kHz Proximity Cards - Cost-effective, proven technology
  • ✓ Smart Cards (13.56MHz) - Enhanced security with encryption
  • ✓ Multi-technology readers for mixed environments
  • ✓ Photo ID card printing and encoding

Mobile Access

  • ✓ NFC smartphone credentials
  • ✓ Bluetooth Low Energy (BLE) readers
  • ✓ Mobile app integration
  • ✓ Visitor management through mobile devices

Keypad & Biometric

  • ✓ PIN code access with audit trails
  • ✓ Fingerprint recognition systems
  • ✓ Multi-factor authentication options
  • ✓ Weather-resistant outdoor keypads

Applications

Tailored solutions for every industry

Hotel Guest Rooms

RFID locks, mobile keys, property management system integration, and master key management for hospitality properties.

College Dormitories

Student ID card integration, time-based access schedules, common area control, and semester-based credential management.

Office Buildings

Multi-tenant access control, elevator integration, parking access, and visitor management systems.

Secure Areas

Server rooms, laboratories, storage areas, and other high-security zones with multi-factor authentication.

System Features

Enterprise-grade functionality with user-friendly management

Management Software

  • ✓ Web-based administration dashboard
  • ✓ Real-time monitoring and alerts
  • ✓ Comprehensive audit trails
  • ✓ Custom reporting and analytics

User Management

  • ✓ Bulk user import/export
  • ✓ Time-based access schedules
  • ✓ Holiday and exception calendars
  • ✓ Temporary visitor credentials

Integration Options

  • ✓ Property management systems
  • ✓ Video surveillance integration
  • ✓ Building automation systems
  • ✓ Fire alarm integration

Professional Installation & Support

Certified technicians and ongoing service

System Design

Comprehensive site survey, security assessment, and custom system design to meet your specific requirements and budget.

Professional Installation

Certified technicians handle all wiring, device installation, and system configuration. Minimal disruption to your operations.

Training & Documentation

Complete system training for administrators and users, plus comprehensive documentation and operation manuals.

Ongoing Support

Service contracts available for maintenance, updates, and 24/7 support. We keep your system running smoothly.
